meanings.meaning: 电话，电话系统；受话器，听筒

exampleSentences?.sentence: "I didn't tell you over the phone," she said. "I didn't know who might be listening."
exampleSentences?.sentenceTranslation: “我没有在电话里告诉你，”她说。“我不知道谁会在听。”

exampleSentences?.sentence: She looked forward to talking to her daughter by phone.
exampleSentences?.sentenceTranslation: 她盼望着和她女儿通电话交谈。
